Item.name: Bag of Pomegrenade Chips
Item.description: Dried pomegrenade chips. A popular little snack to watch the annual 'DUNWICE FACE-OFF' to.

Item.name: Bag of Mutated Pomegrenade Chips
Item.description: Dried mutated pomegrenade chips. A popular little snack. It is said to speed up the healing of burns a bit.

Item.name: Bread Slices
Item.description: Two slices of bread. Great for making sandwiches!

Item.name: Jerky
Item.description: A few stripes of jerky. A cheap and easy meal to make. It's impossible to tell what it's made of, but the taste is ok. Eating it makes you thirsty and doesn't give you any benefits other than satiating you.

Item.name: Meal of Madness
Item.description: Content: 1x Crawler Burger | 8x Crawler Nuggets | 1x Can of Couwola Cola | 1x Random Toy

Item.description: Content: 1x Crawler Burger | 8x Crawler Nuggets | 1x Can of Couwola Cola | 1x Random Toy
